snippet.title: For Sale: DC Mansion Occupied By President Calvin Coolidge
snippet.description: 15 Dupont Cir NW, Washington, DC For sale: $26 million When the roof leaks, you're going to have to do some repairs. snippet.title: An Interview with Western Union Foundation President Luella Chavez D'Angelo
snippet.description: Recently, I interviewed Luella Chavez D’Angelo, President of the Western Union Foundation, the philanthropic arm of the Western Union Company, and Senior Vice President of Western Union Social Ventures. As president, she shapes the direction, Corporate Responsibility and the giving strategies of the Foundation and is an outstanding advocate for [...] read »

snippet.title: Hawaii's Most Exclusive Community: Inside The Billionaire Getaway Kukio
snippet.description: For the average tourist a trip to Hawaii might involve a crowded Honolulu beach, some fruity drinks, perhaps a flower lei. But for those with bigger bank accounts and perhaps the right connections, a completely different Hawaii paradise awaits. Carved into the lava of the Big Island's Kona coast, Kukio is [...] read »

snippet.title: Can Corporate Leaders Push Through Immigration Reform In 2014?
snippet.description: In 2014, business associations, church councils, and a number of prominent executives from companies such as Yahoo, Intel, and HP are working with the administration of U.S. President Barack Obama to move forward with immigration reform, despite fierce opposition from some Republicans. This techcrunch article explains, “Unfortunately, 2014 is an [...]

snippet.title: Andreessen Horowitz Makes First Major Digital Health Investment With Omada Health
snippet.description: Omada Health, which is pioneering the application of clinically validated programs online, raised $23 million in a series B round. Andreessen Horowitz led the investment, with participation from Kaiser Permanente Ventures, and returning investors U.S. Venture Partners and the Vertical Group—bringing the total amount raised to $28.4 million. Once a [...] read »
